name: Speech-F
tagline: HTML 5 Media Player with Search-Within-Video and Tagging feature
body:
### Welcome to Speech-F project. Speech-F is a HTML5 Media player with Search-Within-Video and Tagging feature. Speech-F media player can be used to upload video/audio files to websites using simple HTML snippets, making the media content both searchable and taggable instantly. ### Demo Currently supported only in **Chrome**.
[Tron Video](http://ec2-54-235-225-226.compute-1.amazonaws.com/speechf-js/trondemo.html)
[HTML5 Lecture Video](http://ec2-54-235-225-226.compute-1.amazonaws.com/speechf-js/lecturedemo.html) ### Authors and Contributors Currently the sole contributor to Speech-F project is @shiva2110 . The project is very much under development as of May 2013. However, this is a very exciting project with contributions required in technologies involving **HTML5, Javascript, Jquery, Java and REST** framework. If you are interested in making videos and audios of the world **searchable and taggable**, for instance if you are interested in **changing the experience of watching a long boring lecture or a game highlights video more interesting and interactive**, please contact me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
